page.title: 02GARAGES
page.content: {COWIES}has been open for 10 years.It now runs a car showroom and a petrol station.They sell about 85 cars/month. The busiest time of the year for selling cars is in August, when the new registration numbers come out. 60% of cars, are sold with a part-exchange deals.{COWIES}employ 49 people in their garage. The filling station sells about 80,000 litres of fuel/week and gets 3 deliveries every week. { {MOBIL}gets deliveries of 9000 gallons/ week. The garage is self-service. The garage has been open about 15 years. It employs 6 people full-time and 5 part-time. The garage runs a video hire service where people can hire video cassettes.
